keel.Algorithms.Fuzzy_Rule_Learning.Genetic.Shared.OptimLocal

Class FUN

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Fuzzy_Rule_Learning.Genetic.Shared.OptimLocal.FUN
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FUNGPRS

    public abstract class FUN
extends java.lang.Object

    Class for duplicate the initial ana used rles and fro filter the used ones. Need: The initial set of rules and the used ones

    Since:
    JDK1.5

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
